78.title: Detective Chimp
78.author: Paul Levitz, script ; Gil Kane, pencils ; Klaus Janson, inks ; Carl Gafford, colors ; John Costanza, letters
notes: Features Superman, Wonder Woman, Batman, Jonah Hex, Congo Bill, Congorilla, Bwana Beast, Aquaman, Viking Prince, Hawkman, Hawkwoman, Adam Strange, Detective Chimp, J'Onn J'Onzz, Zatanna, Deadman, Supergirl, Starfire, and Red Tornado.
Data from Jon Ingersoll, via Grand Comics Database Project.

80.heading: "Detective Click Hunt" 7 p. in Sparkling Stars, no. 20 (Dec.
80.author: [No author]
notes: "The man with the gun is Leo Reis, and it looks as if Inspector Click Hunt and Arizona are in a jam. How did they get in it? Why it's all unfolded in this thrilling, surprised packed adventure."
